UNIFIED MESSAGING
Unified Messaging

Connect Marketing Cloud and Service Cloud Digital Engagement to messaging capabilities across email, SMS, and third-party messaging apps such as WhatsApp. Configure these channels with your own addresses and accounts, and then send marketing and service messages. Depending on your business needs, you may decide to implement all channel types or just one.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Unified Messaging for WhatsApp is available in Enterprise and Unlimited Editions for Marketing Cloud Engagement and Service Cloud Digital Engagement
Unified Messaging for Email and SMS is available in Enterprise and Unlimited Editions for Marketing Cloud Growth
Not supported in Government Cloud Plus
